page.title: 03WALTON PRIORY MIDDLE SCHOOL
page.content: Beacon Rise Walton Staffs: 19 Roll:500+ A day in the life of Sarah Simpson (11) I hear the voice of my mum. "Wake up its 7.30." My feet slowly move towards the floor. Still half asleep I get dressed into my uniform,a yellow skirt white shirt and grey sweater. My PE kit Maths homework and pencil case are just a few of the things I carry to school. Joanne knocks on the door, we walk up Pirehill Lane and into school down a hill called the ramp. The whistle is blown we hang bags up and go to register. Soon we move to 1st lesson ,maths,discussing our homework - volume of a certain shape. This lesson always seems to last for ages. At last we are let out and go to music. We go out to play and the whistle is blown. Next is workshop and games. I walk home at 3.45 No clubs today so I watch TV. Goodnight and to sleep for another schoolday.
